auth.login_subtitle: Secure Identity Verification for Digital India

consent.title: Digital Personal Data Protection (DPDP) Consent Request
consent.template: I, the undersigned, hereby give my voluntary and informed consent to ComplianceDesk.ai to process my personal data (including Identity documents) for the purpose of identity verification and regulatory compliance. I understand that my data will be stored securely in the Asia-South1 region and will not be shared with unauthorized third parties.

niti.greeting: Namaste! I am Niti, your AI compliance assistant.
niti.help: How can I assist you with your regulatory verification today?
